alert.note: Alert for Platte (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 09 at 3:44PM CST by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR AN ICE JAM IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Low land flooding caused by an ice jam is ongoing. Multiple ice jams have been reported by emergency management along the Loup River west of Columbus. One jam was just south of Lake Oconee and the other was near the Union Pacific Black bridge. * WHERE...Along the Loup River west of Columbus and upstream of the Highway 81 bridge. * WHEN...Until 330 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 333 PM CST, emergency management reported an ice jam in the advisory area. Minor flooding was ongoing. - Low lying areas along the river between Lake Oconee and Columbus may experience minor flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
